versiculos.texto: Papuru, Tsiriwanu meta Timuteu, tekanixewairitiaka tetsarunikatari xemiyutixexeiriwa Kakaiyari mita'ukiyari hetsie xetewiyati, Ti'aitame Ketsutsi Kiritsitu hetsie xetewiyati.
Kakaiyari mita'ukiyari, Ketsutsi Kiritsitu miti'aitame, 'aixia mekete'u'iyarini xe- hetsiemieme, mekexepitiaka yu'iyaritsie xemika'uximatiariekaki.

Neuxei 'iwamarixi, kaneuyeweka tame taheyemeki pamipariyutsi temipitiakaki Kakaiyari xehepaitsita, kemireuyewetse yatemiteyuriekaki xeme keyuri xemite'erie xemitaweriyarimeki, meta yuxexuiti yunaiti xemitetamiiriyarimeki xeteyukanaki'erieti.

'Ayumieme tameri 'aixia te'utiyuati xehepaitsita yatekateniwakuxaxatiwani miki memiyutixexeiriwa Kakaiyari hetsie metewiyati, mipai teteniwakihiaweni, kexemite'uka'eniwa, yuri kexemite'erie mexi xetaweweiyariwa, mexi xe'uximatiarie, meta naime kexemi'itiarietiwe.

Yaxe'itiariekaku kanimatsiikini Kakaiyari heitseriemeki kemiti'iniata 'itsikametiti, mipai xeteta'iniatsieme xemeta xekanimariwakakuni, xehetsie kemitinakeni 'axemu'uwaniki Kakaiyari tixe'aitiwametikaku, mipai mitiyiniki xetenikwineni xemeta.
Kamitsi, Kakaiyari heitseriemeki katiniyuriemiki kemitiwapinirieni wa'uximatiati miki memixe'uximatia,

xeme kemitixepinirieni xemeta xe'uxipitiati xemi'uximatiarie, yatati'uxipitiati tameta, kepauka matsiikiti mayani Ti'aitame Ketsutsi taheima 'akamieti, yuniuki tuayamete memitirikawi wahamatia 'akamieti, taipai merikaiyeti.
Heitseriemeki kaniwaranutaxiriemiki miki memika'imate Kakaiyari, miki yamemikatekahu Tati'aitiwame Ketsutsi niukieya 'aixia manuyine hetsie.
Miki mipai memi'anene ke- memite'anutaxiriyani, wahetsie tininakimiki memika'unarieniki yuheyemeki, Ti'aitame hixieya mekaxeiyati meta tirikaiyeti kemitimariwe meka'ixeiyati

kepauka munuani, kaninuamikitsi wit- simitixeiyarieniki yuteiterima wahetsie tiwiyati, yunaiti yuri memite'uta'eri memihixiyaniki me'i'ixiarieti 'iya tukaritsie, mipai katiniyimiki yuri xemite'ita'eririki tita temitehekiatakai xehetsia.
Mipai mitiyiniki, tekanitanenewieka taheyemeki, mipai mitixemaikaki xeme kemireuyewetse 'amuyeikaniki Kakaiyari xe'u'uwame 'ita'inieyu, naime kexemiteyurie yuri xete'erieti.
Mipai tiyiyu, kemi'ane Tati'aitiwame Ketsutsi mihiki witsikatinixeiyariemiki xehetsie tiwiyati, xemeta witsixekatenixeiyariekuni Kiritsitu 'aixia mitiuka'iyariki.
Hiki 'iwamarixi, Tati'aitiwame Ketsutsi Kiritsitu kemitinuani hepaitsita meta hetsiana ketemitekuxeiriyani, mipai tepitexewawirie,

yapauka xepikaheuyuyexiriwani yumu'utsie meta xepikamamaka hipame kemitiyini niukiyariki, yatini xewiti mipai tikuxatakaku, yatini xapa tahetsia kename miemeki, mipai 'ayetaineme: «Ti'aitame tukarieya paye'ari».
Xepikatepitiaka nikahirixia xewiti xe'ukwamana, kariki meri hipati Kakaiyari me'aye'unieti mekanakinikuni meta matsiikime kanayuyeitiamiki miki tewi 'axamitiyuruwame, kemi'ane mika'unarieni.
Miki neye'uniekamiki kanitawe'eriekamiki naime Kakaiyari mititewa meta naime mirayexeiyarie,
